channel.title: { Celso Mireles }
channel.description: Blog and personal website of Celso Mireles, blogging mainly for tech. Opinions expressed are mine.

item.title: Thoughts on the Hamburger Menu
item.description: I must admit, I would internally roll my eyes when friends bash on the now famous Hamburger Menu.

item.title: Change of Scenery
item.description: I havenâ€™t really had an online space to share some writing lately. I used to have a WordPress site, but that was too complicated to handle for just a simple blog.
